name: Pixel Block
description:
The Zebra's First Game

Note that that game is in a prototype state! I am currently trying to get ideas.

Controls

A and D = Move Side to Side

W or Space = Jump

S = Fall Down Through Platform

R = Restart Level

E = Go to next level

Official Discord Server: https://discord.gg/EP6rWr4Km8

Developed By: The Zebra

Published By: BoopSucks@Art
